information: company is specialized in the field of aromatic and herbal plants as well as has a recognized know - how field of saffron. We are able to create a range of natural plant extracts which are all made in France. We have developed an innovative extraction process which has been recognize internationally several times (Bronze Medal at the Geneva International Inventions Fair, Gold Medal at Innova Brusse Eurisko d`Or). This patented technology helps to achieve an unique quality and maximum extraction of Crocin, picrocrocin and safranal in our saffron extract.
